data.title: Graduation 2024: Here’s the commencement schedule for Central NY high schools
data.meta_description: See list of time, date and place for graduation ceremonies in Onondaga, Cayuga, Madison and Oswego counties and find out about our plans for more high school Class of 2024 coverage.
data.text:
It’s almost time for Central New York high school commencement ceremonies, which this year will begin as early as June 2 and continue through June 29.

Syracuse.com has plans to publish lists of the candidates for graduation for each high school and share interesting information about each school’s valedictorian and salutatorian with a Q&A.

>> All of our high school graduation coverage can be found here.

As we publish lists of candidates for graduation for each school, we will add links to that coverage in this story.

Here’s a list of time, date and locations for graduations in Onondaga, Cayuga, Madison and Oswego counties.

Onondaga County

Baldwinsville Christian Academy, 7 p.m., Friday, June 14, Baldwinsville Christian Academy, 7312 Van Buren Road, Baldwinsville, NY 13027
